div1.head: Draft of newspaper article by Frank Carey, November 23, 1952
div1.p: LPA
(ADVANCE FOR AMS OF SUNDAY, NOV. 23)
BY FRANK CAREY

(ADVANCE) WASHINGTON, NOV.22-(AP)-THE CUBAN GOVERNMENT HAS TAKEN
NEW STEPS TO PRESERVE ONE OF THE GREAT “BATTLEFIELDS” OF MEDICAL
HISTORY--THE SITE NEAR HAVANA WHERE WALTER REED CONDUCTED EXPERIMENTS
LEADING TO THE CONQUEST OF YELLOW FEVER IN 1900.

THIS WAS LEARNED TODAY ON THE EVE OF THE 50TH ANNIVERSARY OF THE
DEATH OF MAJOR REED. HE WAS THE AMERICAN ARMY DOCTOR WHO INSPIRED
A VALIANT BAND OF AMERICAN AND SPANISH VOLUNTEERS TO FACE POSSIBLE
DEATH TO TEST A CUBAN DOCTOR'S THEORY THAT THE VILLAINOUS AND MYSTERIOUS
“YELLOW JACK” WAS TRANSMITTED BY MOSQUITOES.

SPECIFICALLY, THE CUBAN GOVERNMENT RECENTLY UNDERTOOK ACTIVE
MEASURES TO MAKE NATIONAL MONUMENTAL AREA OUT OF OLD “CAMP LAZEAR”
AT QUEMADOS DE MARIANAO JUST OUTSIDE HAVANA. THE PLACE WILL BE
FORMALLY MEMORIALIZED AT SPECIAL CEREMONIES TO BE HELD ON DECEMBER 3--
THE BIRTHDAY OF THE LATE DR. CARLOS FINLAY, THE CUBAN DOCTOR WHOSE
“MOSQUITO THEORY” WAS PROVED TO BE VALID BY REED'S HISTORIC TESTS.

IT WAS AT CAMP LAZEAR, NAMED FOR AN AMERICAN ARMY DOCTOR WHO DIED
OF YELLOW FEVER DURING THE EARLY DAYS OF THE RESEARCH, THAT REED CONDUC-
TED HIS CONCLUSIVE EXPERIMENTS WITH THE AID OF THE VOLUNTEERS.

THE TESTS WERE CONDUCTED IN TWO SPECIAL BUILDINGS--ONE OF WHICH
STILL STANDS TODAY. IT HAS JUST BEEN REPAIRED FOR THE FIRST TIME
AFTER STANDING FOR YEARS “CREAKING WITH AGE AND SLEEPING IN THE
CUBAN SUN NEAR A FIELD OF CORN,” ACCORDING TO ONE OBSERVER.

IT WAS IN THIS SMALL STRUCTURE THAT A GROUP OF REED'S VOLUNTEERS
UNDERWENT A CRUESOME EXPERIENCE WHICH EXPLODED THE THEORY THAT
YELLOW FEVER COULD BE CONTRACTED FROM “FOMITES”--THE SOILED AND BLOODY
BEDDING AND CLOTHING OF FEVER VICTIMS.

IT WAS THERE THAT THEY SLEPT FOR 21 NIGHTS ON FILTHY AND BLOOD-
STAINED SHEETS. THEY COVERED THEIR PILLOWS WITH TOWELS SOILED WITH
THE BLOOD AND “BLACK VOMIT” OF FEVER VICTIMS. HEAT FROM A COAL STOVE
HEATED THE PORLY VENTILATED PLACE TO TEMPERATURES UP TO 100 DEGREES.
THE STENCH, AT TIMES, WAS ENOUGH TO DRIVE THE MEN OUT, BUT ALWAYS THEY
RETURNED.

DESPITE THIS NARROWING EXPERIENCE, NOT ONE OF THE MEN CONTRACTED
YELLOW FEVER--BECAUSE THEIR QUARTERS, FOR ALL THEIR FILTH, WERE
CAREFULLY SCREENED AGAINST MOSQUITOES:

THE SECOND BUILDING--IN WHICH SOME MEN WERE PURPOSELY EXPOSED TO
THE BITES OF INFECTED MOSQUITOES--HAS LONG SINCE DISAPPEARED, BELIEVED
TO HAVE BEEN DESTROYED BY A HURRICANE. IT WAS IN THAT BUILDING,
WHERE A NUMBER OF THE BITTEN MEN CONTRACTED “YELLOW JACK,” THAT REED
GOT HIS FINAL PROOF THAT THE MOSQUITO WAS THE VILLAIN.
X22WX.

THE STILL-STANDING STRUCTURE-KNOWN AS “BUILDING NO. 1”--HAS NOW BEEN
MADE THE CENTRAL AREA OF A LITTLE PARK.

THE OLD CORNFIELD HAS BEEN CLEARED AND THE LAND GRADES. A FLAGPOLE
RISES ABOVE THE BUILDING--AND A STONE WALL IS BEING BUILT NEARBY.

ON THE WALL WILL BE PLACED BRONZE MEDALLIONS HONORING REED, FINLAY
AND OTHER AMERICAN AND SPANISH DOCTORS WHO TOOK PART IN THE RESEARCH.
ON IT, TOO, WILL BE PLACED BRONZE TABLETS CONTAINING THE NAMES OF ALL
THE VOLUNTEERS WHO LONG HAVE RANKED AS HEROES OF THEIR RESPECTIVE
COUNTRIES.

OLD “BUILDING NO. 1” WOULD PERHAPS NOT BE STANDING TODAY WERE IT NOT
FOR ANOTHER AMERICAN DOCTOR--DR. PHILIP HENCH OF THE MAYO CLINIC, CO-
WINNER OF A NOBEL PRIZE FOR HIS RESEARCH ON CORTISONE AND ACTH, THE
DRUGS WHICH HAVE SHOWN PROMISE AGAINST ARTHRITIS AND VARIOUS OTHER
DISEASES.

HENCH, WHO HAS MADE AN AVOCATION OF THE WALTER REED EPIC, “RE-
DISCOVERED” OLD BUILDING NO. 1 IN 1940--AND, FOR MORE THAN A DECADE, HE
HAS BEEN ACTIVE IN THE CAMPAIGN TO HAVE THE OLD STRUCTURE REPAIRED AND
PRESERVED.

WITH HENCH AT THE TIME OF THE “REDISCOVERY” WAS THE LATE JOHN J.
MORAN, ONE OF THE ORIGINAL AMERICAN VOLUNTEERS WHO GOT YELLOW FEVER
FROM EXPOSURE TO INFECTED MOSQUITOES.

THE VOLUNTEERS WERE TO GET $200 IF THEY CONTRACTED FEVER, $100 IF
THEY DIDN'T.

MORAN, WHO NEVER TOOK A CENT FOR HIS PART IN THE TESTS, ONCE
TOLD THE ASSOCIATED PRESS:

“I FELT IT WAS A CHANCE TO DO SOME GOOD IN THIS LIFE. ALSO, I
DIDN'T WANT THEN WRITING ON MY TOMBSTONE: ‘HERE LIES JOHN MORAN, WHO
DIED FOR $200...’”
(END ADVANCE FOR AMS OF SUNDAY, NOV 23 - MOVED NOV 21)
